description: Try our easy to follow Mango Krispie Cakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango Krispie Cakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the butter in a large saucepan over a low heat. Stir in the golden syrup and sugar and stir to dissolve the sugar.
Remove from the heat, add the Rice Krispies, mango, raisins, pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds and stir well to mix.
Spoon the mixture into 16 paper cake cases and chill in the refrigerator for 15 minutes to set.
